question.text: Which one of the following restriction enzyme can cut <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></msup></math> site of pBR322?

solution.text: pBR 322 plasmid has two antibiotic resistant gene one for Tertracyclin resistant and other for amphicilin resistant, these two functions as selectable marker gene.  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></msup></math>  site has two restriction enzyme recognition site, BamH I and Sal I site.
